titleStmt.title: The history of Romish treasons & usurpations together with a particular account of many gross corruptions and impostures in the Church of Rome, highly dishonourable and injurious to Christian religion : to which is prefixt a large preface to the Romanists / carefully collected out of a great number of their own approved authors by Henry Foulis.
titleStmt.author: Foulis, Henry, ca. 1635-1669.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: numerous errors in paging. Pages 199-102 lacking; p. 283-286 repeated in their place. Pages 86-113 from Christ Church Library copy spliced at end.
Half title: The history of popish treasons and usurpations.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Library.
